data.name: while True: learn() Mega Map of Machine Learning
data.detailed_description:
while True: learn() Mega Map of Machine Learning is a huge infographic about technologies and their applications, best highlights and key moments of the ML history. You can use it as an in-class poster (for computer science classes or similar) or desktop wallpaper. Some of our players just print it out to be hanged in their offices and homes. Some of them are using it for their kids, to explain interesting facts about the tech world. Also, it is a good thing to make a research for a school project.

Cats included.

Formats

  • FullHD
  • 4K
  • 4K Dark (best for wallpaper at desktop flooded with icons)
  • 8K
  • 16K
  • Vector PDF (ready for printing of any size)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista / 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
